title: 2006 Kidron Lift A Loft Catering Truck
item_description:
2006 Kidron Lift A Loft Catering Truck

Specifications

  • Year: 2006
  • Make: Kidron
  • Model: 10C9ASW84
  • Serial: 06S00461
  • Odometer Reads: 3,206
  • Key: Available
  • Body Style: Box Truck
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT245/75R16
  • Deck Length: 120”
  • Deck Width: 75”
  • Wall Height: 78.5

CARB Off-Road Diesel Disclosure Statement: “When operated in California, any off-road diesel vehicle may be subject to the California Air Resources Board In-Use Off-road Diesel Vehicle Regulation. It therefore could be subject to retrofit or accelerated turnover requirements to reduce emissions of air pollutants. For more information, please visit the California Air Resources Board website at http://www.arb.ca.gov/msprog/ordiesel/ordiesel.htm.”
